testcase.classname: To Test The Functionality Of User Menu
testcase.name: To Approve the User
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to Administration and then User Approve menu................passed Then User goes to Approve screen and approves the record using "User_ModifyRepairApproveView".passed

testcase.classname: To Test The Functionality Of User Menu
testcase.name: To View the User
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to Administration and then User List menu...................passed Then User goes to List screen and views the record using "User_ModifyRepairApproveView".passed
